name: TAC-CORP VIP Access
detailed_description:
Customize each ship to your liking with colors and patterns making you stand out from the rest.

SHIP COLOR AND PATTERNS
Lots of fun paint patterns for your ships with more being added every update!

AFTERBURNER
Make hearts or stars come out of your ship's exhaust when you use the after burner. (You can color them too!)

WINDSHIELD
Colorize your windshield with any color of the rainbow. Or the RGB spectrum.

TUNNEL SERVER SYSTEM
Internet is bad? No admin access to your network? Port-forwarding too hard?

The Tunnel Servers are here to save the day. Generate a server to play on with your settings and level list. Host as many times as you like for as long as you like with this one time DLC payment.

WARNING:
  • User made levels are unavailable to use when playing on a cloud server.
  • The system is not perfect. Users (even the host) who live far from the US West region may experience lag.

short_description: TAC-CORP VIP Access lets you customize each ship aesthetically and host servers on the cloud.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: ~2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
